welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Worrstadt, Germany! This charming city is known for its picturesque vineyards, delicious wine, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Worrstadt has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Mainz Finthen Airport Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Mainz Finthen Airport Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Base Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 24-hour time limit for each session.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
